amendatorysection.para: A person shall be guilty of a felony if he threatens or attempts to threaten harm to a member of the Board of Parole with the purpose to influence his decision, opinion, recommendation, vote, or other exercise of discretion as member of the board or if he privately addresses to any member of the board any representation, entreaty, argument or other communication designed to influence the outcome of any matter which is or may come before the board on the basis of considerations other than those authorized by law, and shall be guilty of a Class IV felony.
